title: Orange Is The New Black actress Laura Prepon pregnant with second child
text:

Laura Prepon, who starred as Alex Vause in Netflix's Orange Is The New Black, is pregnant again.

The 39-year-old is expecting her second with her actor husband Ben Foster.

Laura announced the happy news on Instagram where she shared a picture of her baby bump.

"We are so excited to announce that our family is growing. Life is beautiful! #knockedup ", she said.

Laura and Ben have been together since 2016,and share two-year-old daughter Ella.

(Image: laura prepon/Instagram)

They became engaged that same year and got married in 2018.

Laura has opened up about her controversial Scientologist beliefs before to Celebrity Magazine.

Entertainment.ie reported on the interview, where she said discovering its teachings was like "finally something was speaking [her] language".

(Image: WireImage)

She also said "auditing", which is the religion's version of therapy, helped her deal with her emotions and find a sense of complete calm no matter what.

Other famous Scientologists include Tom Cruise, Kirstie Alley andd Elizabeth Moss.

Scientology was founded in 1952 by science fiction writer L Ron Hubbard (1911-1986).

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Reuters)

It is a religion which promises to help followers develop a deep understanding of their spiritual nature and its relationship to all living things and the universe. Their website claims the ultimate goal is "true spiritual enlightenment and freedom for all".

With headquarters in Gold Base, California, Scientology claims it has 10,000 churches globally and 4.4million people sign up annually.

However, critics claim the number of followers is a lot less and more likely to be in the hundreds of thousands.
description: The Scientologist actress is expecting her second baby with her husband, also an actor
